form.goBackWarning: Changes to terms will require an approval transaction and accrue additional gas fees. Would you like to proceed?

proTips.1: Connect to your bank account to reduce collateral ratios.
proTips.2: Set your duration of loan term in accordance to your planned use of the loan.
proTips.3: Higher collateral ratios can reduce your interest rate.
proTips.4: Interest rates are calculated as a result of your credit history.
proTips.5: Your collateral ratio is set to the minimum amount of collateral needed.
proTips.6: Accept terms to approve a transaction spend.
proTips.7: Once a loan is requested you will need to resubmit terms to make changes.
proTips.8: You can increase your collateral amount to reduce liquidation risk.
proTips.9: Increase your collateral amount to reduce liquidation risk.

dashboard.loggedOutMessage: Please connect your wallet to view the dashboard.

deposit-redeem.description: Select an asset to redeem your APY to date.
deposit-redeem.assetChangeWarningMessage: Redeeming your APY will submit a transaction and incur gas fees. Costs will be debited from your wallet. Are you sure you want to proceed?

deposit-withdraw.description: Select an asset to withdraw your deposit to date.

borrow-deposit.description: Deposit additional collateral for an outstanding loan.

borrow-withdraw.description: Select the loan you want to withdraw collateral from.

spend-compound.description: Select the loan you want to withdraw into.
